org.mortbay.jetty.grizzly
Class GrizzlyConnectorAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.mortbay.component.AbstractLifeCycle
      org.mortbay.jetty.AbstractBuffers
          org.mortbay.jetty.AbstractConnector
              org.mortbay.jetty.nio.AbstractNIOConnector
                  org.mortbay.jetty.grizzly.GrizzlyConnector
                      org.mortbay.jetty.grizzly.GrizzlyConnectorAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
LifeCycle, Buffers, Connector, NIOConnector
public class GrizzlyConnectorAdapter
extends GrizzlyConnector

Simple connector that disable Grizzly's SelectorThread ServerSocketChannel. This class must only be used when Jetty is embedded in GlassFish.

Author:
Jeanfrancois Arcand
